com.appscend.media.renderers

Class MediaPlayerRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appscend.media.renderers.MediaPlayerRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KRAdapter, IVeeplayRenderer

    public class MediaPlayerRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVeeplayRenderer
    Created by Andrei Marinescu on 26.03.2015. Renderer implementation of the native SDK MediaPlayer class
